Rewards Rate: 8 Reward Points on every Rs. 200 spent online. 4 RPs spent offline and 2 RPs on select categories.
Reward Redemption: Reward Points redeemable for movie ticket bookings on YES Rewardz portal at a rate of 1 Reward Point = Re. 0.25 for redemption against hotel/flight bookings, and 1 Reward Point = Re. 0.10 for redemption against gift vouchers, product catalogue, etc.
Golf: 4 complimentary rounds of green fees every year and 1 complimentary golf lesson each month.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Joining fee waiver on spending ₹10,000 or more within 30 days after receiving the card, and the renewal fee is waived off on a spend of ₹1 lakh or more in the previous year.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver at all the fuel stations in India for all the transactions between Rs. 400 and Rs. 5,000.

product_details: 8 Reward Points on every ₹200 spent online. 2 Reward Points on every ₹200 spent on other categories such as insurance. The joining fee is waived on retail spends of over ₹10,000 within 30 days after receiving the card. The renewal fee is waived on spending over ₹1 lakh on retail purchases in the previous year.
